about_the_game:
In the near future, humanity has achieved remarkable progress with the discovery of infinite energy called "Akasha Particles." However, this advancement also brought about the emergence of "Gigantic Beasts," which dethroned humans from the top of the ecological hierarchy. The survival of the displaced humans now depends on large humanoid weapons called "Exos" and the "Mercenaries" who pilot them.

The protagonist, a former mercenary, lost the ability to use Akasha Particles due to a past accident. Unable to pilot an Exo, he considers himself a "defective" and wanders aimlessly, leading a reclusive life.

One day, he meets a young girl aspiring to be an Exo mechanic. She inherited her late mother's designs and built an Exo that is scorned as an "antique" by others because it doesn't use Akasha Particles, a stark contrast to the technology of their time.

A defective mercenary who can't use particles and an antique Exo that doesn't rely on them—when these two meet, the wheels of their story slowly begin to turn.

"―――Launch, Cuniculus."


【Battle】
Face off against Gigantic Beasts and enemy Exos using your arsenal of weapons! This game features a traditional command-based RPG battle system.

【Missions】
Accept missions and set out on various objectives such as annihilation, defense, and rescue. Some missions also include secret objectives that offer valuable rewards.

【Arena】
Compete against other mercenaries in the Arena. Defeating powerful Arena rankers will earn you luxurious prizes. Aim to become the champion by winning successive battles.

【Labyrinth】
Enter the ever-changing "Abyssal Labyrinth," home to stronger-than-usual Gigantic Beasts. The deeper you go, the more substantial the rewards, including large sums of money and rare enhancement materials. It's perfect for testing your well-honed Exo.

【Equipment Customization】
Customize your Exo with weapons and parts. Whether you prefer a mobility-focused combat machine or a high-firepower, heavily armored unit, tailor your Exo to your strategy. Enhancing your favorite equipment can unlock new abilities.

【Auction】
In addition to standard shops, participate in auctions that become available mid-game. Here, you can bid on rare parts and enhancement materials that are not found elsewhere.

【Automatons】
Acquire reliable allies in the form of autonomous combat units known as Automatons. Summon them during battles and strengthen them with special items called Gears.

【Heroine Development】
You can also develop the heroine who accompanies you as an operator. Use PP gained from ranking up to enhance various skills and support attributes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
